overview: Once every 1000 years the soul of an insatiable nympho is reborn. Concealed in the body of Viper, this wealthy and beautiful nymphette is in constant pursuit of quenching her wild sexual thirst. The look in her eyes only hints at the torrid hunger that dwells within her. She has no limits... knows no boundaries... anything goes, as long as it's not tame! Like a true nature's child, she was "Born to be wild"!!!
title: Born to be Wild
